title: Demo: LE3D: A Privacy-preserving Lightweight Data Drift Detection Framework. (arXiv:2211.01827v1 [cs.LG])
description: This paper presents LE3D; a novel data drift detection framework for preserving data integrity and confidentiality. LE3D is a generalisable platform for evaluating novel drift detection mechanisms within the Internet of Things (IoT) sensor deployments. Our framework operates in a distributed manner, preserving data privacy while still being adaptable to new sensors with minimal online reconfiguration. Our framework currently supports multiple drift estimators for time-series IoT data and can easily be extended to accommodate new data types and drift detection mechanisms. This demo will illustrate the functionality of LE3D under a real-world-like scenario.
dc:creator: Ioannis Mavromatis, Aftab Khan
